content: The FHIR Build Process documentation still has a reference to needing to create a gforge account. Before I update that to say "Github" account, I just want to make certain that there's not some gforge requirement still? @Lloyd McKenzie ?
Change away. No dependency on gForge at all anymore
Okay, I updated all references to gforge on that page.
I also added a bullet under "getting committer access", item d: "Make sure you have an HL7 Confluence and JIRA account, as you'll need to coordinate changes to the build with JIRA trackers"
Confluence & Jira are the same account - so perhaps make that clear?
Changed to :Make sure you have an HL7 Account to access confluence and JIRA, as you'll need to coordinate changes to the build with JIRA trackers
